verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees. <WH4609> Blessed <WH835> is every <WH3605> one that fears <WH3373> the LORD; <WH3068> that walks <WH1980> in his ways. <WH1870>
For you shall eat <WH398> the labor <WH3018> of your hands: <WH3709> happy <WH835> shall you be, and it shall be well <WH2896> with you.

Your wife <WH802> shall be as a fruitful <WH6509> vine <WH1612> by the sides <WH3411> of your house: <WH1004> your children <WH1121> like olive <WH2132> plants <WH8363> round <WH5439> about your table. <WH7979>
Behold, <WH2009> that thus <WH3651> shall the man <WH1397> be blessed <WH1288> that fears <WH3373> the LORD. <WH3068>
The LORD <WH3068> shall bless <WH1288> you out of Zion: <WH6726> and you shall see <WH7200> the good <WH2898> of Jerusalem <WH3389> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of your life. <WH2416>
Yes, you shall see <WH7200> your children's <WH1121> children, <WH1121> and peace <WH7965> on Israel. <WH3478>
